subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Grigor Dimitrov, the No. 7 seed, could not find the proper court positioning to deal with the fleet-footed Gaël Monfils in their fourth-round match.
snippet: Grigor Dimitrov, the No. 7 seed, could not find the proper court positioning to deal with the fleet-footed Gaël Monfils in their fourth-round match.
